name: Dark Eternity Tower
description: Dark theme for the Eternity Tower web game at http://eternitytower.net
additional_info:
v 0.0.18 - Fix bottom loadout bar, item % contrast, and weird third-box-over looking disabled
v 0.0.17 - Fix ability background in battles, tower dropdown, lobby healthbars, and food
v 0.0.16 - Updated for new chat channels
v 0.0.15 - Updated for new layout
v 0.0.14 - Add larger border to unlearnt skills
v 0.0.13 - Darken unavailable farming plots, change Offtopic text color to green for readability
v 0.0.12 - Update some combat floating text + current user dropdown
v 0.0.11 - Increase mining pit size to accommodate new high-res icons
v 0.0.10 - Re-enable selection
v 0.0.9 - Update item quality to be lighter
v 0.0.8 - Updated shop coloring to dark, added fix for text highlighting issue with rapid clicking
v 0.0.7 - Updated new crafting hovers to match dark theme, uncraftable things are now lighter grey shaded
v 0.0.6 - Updated Chat colors to match new default chat colors
v 0.0.5 - Fix coloration issue w/ popup dialogs, fix white area at bottom of Battle screen. Change Combat skill bars to be inline with respective skills.
v 0.0.4 - Fix coloration issue with energy / health on combat screen
v 0.0.3 - Fix coloration issue with inactive farming plots
v 0.0.2 - Fix coloration issue with seed shop / modals
v 0.0.1 - Initial release
